content: 16 st from each side of the sleeve so that 16 st dpn1 12 st are still in stand-by for the second sleeve dpn2 12 st dpn3 20 st starting from the sleeve junction row 1 dpn1 k12 dpn1 k12 from the spare needle dpn2 k12 dpn2 k4 more from the spare needle dpn3 k12 repeat 2x skip repeat 2 there should be 32 st on the spare needle now x k2tog leave the next 16 st on the spare needle in stand by now there are 12+12+16 = 40 st per and slip the 16 last st to dpn3 row knitting in the round back to dpn2 which is already 4 st cast on 4 more stitches for the row 2 to 12 k40 armpit and k4 from dpn3 dpn2 is now 12 dpn3 k12 and pick up 8 stitches from the sleeve they will be reduced using a set of slight thinner needles to 4 st at next row this is to avoid making holes row 13 to 16 repeat k1 p1 20 times cast off the 40 stitches and cut the yarn at 4-6cm 2 -3 4 sleeve we are going to use the last 16 stitches from the spare needle now dpn1 k8 dpn2 k5 dpn3 k3 pick up 8 stitches from armpit and k3 from dpn1 dpn1 5 st dpn2 5 st dpn3 14 st row 1 dpn1 k5 dpn2 k5 dpn3 k3 repeat 2x skip repeat 2 x k2tog k3 now there are 5 + 5+ 10 = 20 st per row knitting in the round please follow the previous sleeve instructions from row 1 to the end 5 finish please take your time for that last step it would be very sad to ruin all the work with a poor finish using a tapestry needle darn all the yarns carefully on the inside make sure there are no holes at the armpits tip i now try to darn a few yarns every time i cut one so that this task is not so long at the end froggybug 2025 mini jumpers english version 3//8 2025 design suggestions 1 to 3 froggybug 2025 mini jumpers english version 4//8 2025 design suggestions 4 to 6 froggybug 2025 mini jumpers english version 5//8 2025 design suggestions 7 to 9 froggybug 2025 mini jumpers english version 6//8 2025 design suggestions 10 to 12 froggybug 2025 mini jumpers english version 7//8 2025 design suggestions 13 to 15 froggybug 2025 mini jumpers english version 8//8
